media.headline: Upton's run-saving sliding catch
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Upton robs Frazier with nice sliding grab
media.bigblurb: Todd Frazier lines a ball to left field, but Justin Upton charges in to make a sliding catch for the third out in the bottom of the 1st

media.headline: Collins' solo home run
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Collins opens the scoring with a solo homer
media.bigblurb: Tyler Collins crushes a solo shot to right-center field to give the Tigers a 1-0 lead in the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Garcia ruled out after challenge
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Garcia out at first after call overturned
media.bigblurb: Avisail Garcia records an infield single, but the Tigers challenge the play in the bottom of the 2nd inning and the call is overturned

media.headline: May's RBI squeeze bunt
media.blurb: DET@CWS: May plates Davidson with squeeze bunt
media.bigblurb: Jacob May lays down a squeeze bunt, allowing Matt Davidson to score from third base to tie the game at 1 in the 2nd inning

media.headline: Iglesias throws out Soto
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Iglesias nabs Soto at the plate in the 2nd
media.bigblurb: Tyler Saladino hits a grounder to Jose Iglesias who throws home to nab Geovany Soto trying to score from third base in the 2nd inning

media.headline: Anderson's RBI single
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Anderson plates May with a single to center
media.bigblurb: Tim Anderson hits a sharp grounder up the middle, allowing Jacob May to score to give the White Sox a 2-1 lead in the 2nd inning

media.headline: Soto's three-run home run
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Soto launches a three-run shot down the line
media.bigblurb: Geovany Soto sends a towering three-run shot down the left-field line to give the White Sox a 5-1 lead in the bottom of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Davidson's three-run homer
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Davidson drives a three-run homer to left
media.bigblurb: Matt Davidson sends a ball over the left-field fence for a three-run home run, extending the team's lead to 9-1 in the 4th inning

media.headline: Garcia's RBI single
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Garcia knocks home Anderson with a single
media.bigblurb: Avisail Garcia delivers a line drive to center field that allows Tim Anderson to score in the bottom of the 4th inning

media.headline: Abreu's RBI base knock
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Abreu brings home Cabrera with a single
media.bigblurb: Jose Abreu sends a base hit up the middle that allows Melky Cabrera to score from third base, extending the club's lead to 10-1

media.headline: Soto's solo shot in the 7th
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Soto hammers his second home run of the game
media.bigblurb: Geovany Soto crushes a solo home run to center for his second homer and fourth RBI of the game in the bottom of the 7th inning

media.headline: Avila's two-out RBI double
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Avila drives an RBI double off the wall
media.bigblurb: Alex Avila sends a high fly ball off the left-field wall that brings home Nicholas Castellanos in the top of the 8th inning

media.headline: Kahnle K's Collins
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Kahnle strikes out Collins swinging
media.bigblurb: Tommy Kahnle forces Tyler Collins to go down swinging for the first out in the top of the 9th inning

media.headline: Boyd K's Anderson
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Boyd fans Anderson in the 1st inning
media.bigblurb: Matt Boyd strikes out Tim Anderson swinging for the first out in the bottom of the 1st inning

media.headline: Soto's two-homer game
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Soto tallies two homers against the Tigers
media.bigblurb: Geovany Soto goes deep twice against the Tigers, smacking a three-run homer in the 3rd and a solo shot in the 7th in the club's 11-2 win

media.headline: Ausmus on loss to White Sox
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Ausmus discusses the Tigers' 11-2 loss
media.bigblurb: Tigers manager Brad Ausmus talks about Matt Boyd's outing and the offensive struggles during the team's 11-2 loss to the White Sox

media.headline: Recap: DET 2, CWS 11
media.blurb: 4/6/17: Soto's two homers lead White Sox past Tigers
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Geovany Soto hit a pair of home runs and Matt Davidson launched a three-run shot as the White Sox defeated the Tigers, 11-2

media.headline: Renteria on win over Tigers
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Renteria on first win as White Sox manager
media.bigblurb: White Sox manager Rick Renteria discusses his first victory as manager of the team and mixing up the lineup with young players and veterans
